001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Collection;
005import java.util.Comparator;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
008import java.util.Objects;
009
010import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
011
012import io.jstach.jstache.JStache;
013import io.jstach.jstachio.JStachio;
014import io.jstach.jstachio.Template;
015import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateInfo;
016import io.jstach.jstachio.spi.JStachioTemplateFinder.SimpleTemplateFinder;
017
018/**
019 * Finds templates based on the model type (class).
020 * <p>
021 * The default {@link JStachio} uses a combination of relection and the ServiceLoader to
022 * find templates.
023 * <p>
024 * Other implementations may want to use their DI framework like Spring or CDI to find
025 * templates.
026 *
027 * @author agentgt
028 *
029 */
030public non-sealed interface JStachioTemplateFinder extends JStachioExtension {
031
032        /**
033         * Finds a {@link Template} if possible otherwise possibly falling back to a
034         * {@link TemplateInfo} based on annotation metadata or some other mechanism.
035         *
036         * @apiNote Callers can do an <code>instanceof Template t</code> to see if a generated
037         * template was returned instead of the fallback {@link TemplateInfo} metadata.
038         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
039         * not the Templates class</em>)
040         * @return the template info which might be a {@link Template} if the generated
041         * template was found.
042         * @throws Exception if any reflection or runtime error happens
043         * @throws NoSuchElementException if the template is not found and there were no other
044         * errors
045         * @throws NullPointerException if the modelType is null
046         */
047        public TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception;
048
049        /**
050         * Finds a template or null if no template is found. Should not throw an exception if
051         * a template is not found.
052         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
053         * not the Templates class</em>)
054         * @return <code>null</code> if the template is was not found or the template info
055         * which might be a {@link Template} if the generated template was found.
056         * @throws NullPointerException if the modelType is null
057         * @see #findTemplate(Class)
058         */
059        default @Nullable TemplateInfo findOrNull(Class<?> modelType) {
060                Objects.requireNonNull(modelType, "modelType");
061                if (Templates.isIgnoredType(modelType)) {
062                        return null;
063                }
064                try {
065                        return findTemplate(modelType);
066                }
067                catch (Exception e) {
068                        return null;
069                }
070        }
071
072        /**
073         * Determines if this template finder has a template for the model type (the class
074         * annotated by JStache).
075         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
076         * not the Templates class</em>)
077         * @return true if this finder has template for modelType
078         * @throws NullPointerException if the modelType is null
079         */
080        default boolean supportsType(Class<?> modelType) {
081                if (Templates.isIgnoredType(modelType)) {
082                        return false;
083                }
084                var t = findOrNull(modelType);
085                if (t == null) {
086                        return false;
087                }
088                return true;
089        }
090
091        /**
092         * Hint on order of template finders. The found {@link JStachioTemplateFinder}s are
093         * sorted naturally (lower number comes first) based on the returned number. Thus a
094         * template finder with a lower order number that {@link #supportsType(Class)} the
095         * model class will be used.
096         * @return default returns zero
097         */
098        default int order() {
099                return 0;
100        }
101
102        /**
103         * The default template finder that uses reflection and or the ServiceLoader.
104         * <p>
105         * <em>This implementation performs no caching. If you would like caching call
106         * {@link #cachedTemplateFinder(JStachioTemplateFinder)} on the returned finder.</em>
107         * @param config used to help find templates as well as logging.
108         * @return default template finder.
109         */
110        public static JStachioTemplateFinder defaultTemplateFinder(JStachioConfig config) {
111                return new DefaultTemplateFinder(config);
112        }
113
114        /**
115         * Decorates a template finder with a cache using {@link ClassValue} with the
116         * modelType as the key.
117         * <p>
118         * <em>The returned finder will only call {@link #findTemplate(Class)} on the passed
119         * in delegate finder to resolve {@link #supportsType(Class)} and
120         * {@link #findOrNull(Class)}! </em>
121         * <p>
122         * While the finder does not provide any eviction the cache will not prevent garbage
123         * collection of the model classes.
124         * @param finder to be decorated unless the finder is already decorated thus it is a
125         * noop to repeateadly call this method on already cached template finder.
126         * @return caching template finder
127         */
128        public static JStachioTemplateFinder cachedTemplateFinder(JStachioTemplateFinder finder) {
129                if (finder instanceof ClassValueCacheTemplateFinder) {
130                        return finder;
131                }
132                return new ClassValueCacheTemplateFinder(finder);
133        }
134
135        /**
136         * Creates a template finder from an iterable of templates. The returned finder will
137         * just loop through the templates and call {@link TemplateInfo#supportsType(Class)}.
138         * To avoid the looping cost wrap the return with
139         * {@link #cachedTemplateFinder(JStachioTemplateFinder)}.
140         * @param templates templates to be searched in order of the iterable
141         * @param order order hint see {@link #order()}.
142         * @return adapted template finder
143         */
144        public static JStachioTemplateFinder of(Iterable<? extends TemplateInfo> templates, int order) {
145                return new IterableTemplateFinder(templates, order);
146        }
147
148        /**
149         * Creates a composite template finder from a list. If the list only has a single
150         * element then it is returned without being wrapped.
151         * @param templateFinders list of template finders.
152         * @return templateFinder searching in order of {@link #order()} then the list order
153         */
154        public static JStachioTemplateFinder of(List<? extends JStachioTemplateFinder> templateFinders) {
155                return CompositeTemplateFinder.of(templateFinders);
156        }
157
158        /**
159         * An easier to implement template finder based on a sequence of templates.
160         *
161         * @author agentgt
162         *
163         */
164        public interface SimpleTemplateFinder extends JStachioTemplateFinder {
165
166                @Override
167                default TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
168                        Objects.requireNonNull(modelType, "modelType");
169                        var t = findOrNull(modelType);
170                        if (t == null) {
171                                throw new TemplateNotFoundException(modelType);
172                        }
173                        return t;
174                }
175
176                @Override
177                default boolean supportsType(Class<?> modelType) {
178                        Objects.requireNonNull(modelType, "modelType");
179                        var t = findOrNull(modelType);
180                        if (t == null) {
181                                return false;
182                        }
183                        return true;
184                }
185
186                @Override
187                default @Nullable TemplateInfo findOrNull(Class<?> modelType) {
188                        var resolvedType = Templates.findJStache(modelType).getKey();
189                        for (var t : templates()) {
190                                if (t.supportsType(resolvedType)) {
191                                        return t;
192                                }
193                        }
194                        return null;
195                }
196
197                /**
198                 * Sequence of templates used to find matching template from model.
199                 * @return templates
200                 */
201                Iterable<? extends TemplateInfo> templates();
202
203        }
204
205}
206
207final class DefaultTemplateFinder implements JStachioTemplateFinder {
208
209        private final JStachioConfig config;
210
211        DefaultTemplateFinder(JStachioConfig config) {
212                super();
213                this.config = config;
214        }
215
216        @Override
217        public TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
218                return Templates.findTemplate(modelType, config);
219        }
220
221        @Override
222        public @Nullable TemplateInfo findOrNull(Class<?> modelType) {
223                return Templates.findTemplateOrNull(modelType, config);
224        }
225
226        @Override
227        public int order() {
228                return Integer.MAX_VALUE;
229        }
230
231}
232
233class TemplateNotFoundException extends NoSuchElementException {
234
235        private static final long serialVersionUID = -4016359589653582060L;
236
237        private final Class<?> modelType;
238
239        public TemplateNotFoundException(Class<?> modelType) {
240                super(errorMessage(modelType));
241                this.modelType = modelType;
242
243        }
244
245        public TemplateNotFoundException(Class<?> modelType, Collection<Templates.TemplateLoadStrategy> strategies) {
246                super(errorMessage(modelType, strategies));
247                this.modelType = modelType;
248
249        }
250
251        public TemplateNotFoundException(String message, Class<?> modelType) {
252                super(message + " " + errorMessage(modelType));
253                this.modelType = modelType;
254
255        }
256
257        protected static String errorMessage(Class<?> modelType) {
258                return "Template not found for type: '" + modelType + "'";
259        }
260
261        protected static String errorMessage(Class<?> modelType, Collection<Templates.TemplateLoadStrategy> strategies) {
262                return errorMessage(modelType) + ", using strategies: " + strategies;
263        }
264
265        public Class<?> modelType() {
266                return modelType;
267        }
268
269}
270
271final class IterableTemplateFinder implements SimpleTemplateFinder {
272
273        private final Iterable<? extends TemplateInfo> templates;
274
275        private final int order;
276
277        public IterableTemplateFinder(Iterable<? extends TemplateInfo> templates, int order) {
278                super();
279                this.templates = templates;
280                this.order = order;
281        }
282
283        @Override
284        public int order() {
285                return this.order;
286        }
287
288        @Override
289        public Iterable<? extends TemplateInfo> templates() {
290                return templates;
291        }
292
293}
294
295final class ClassValueCacheTemplateFinder implements JStachioTemplateFinder {
296
297        private final ClassValue<TemplateInfo> cache;
298
299        private final JStachioTemplateFinder delegate;
300
301        public ClassValueCacheTemplateFinder(JStachioTemplateFinder delegate) {
302                super();
303                this.delegate = delegate;
304                this.cache = new ClassValue<>() {
305
306                        @Override
307                        protected TemplateInfo computeValue(Class<?> type) {
308                                try {
309                                        return delegate.findTemplate(type);
310                                }
311                                catch (Exception e) {
312                                        Templates.sneakyThrow(e);
313                                        throw new RuntimeException();
314                                }
315                        }
316                };
317        }
318
319        @Override
320        public TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
321                Objects.requireNonNull(modelType);
322                return Objects.requireNonNull(cache.get(modelType));
323        }
324
325        @Override
326        public int order() {
327                return delegate.order();
328        }
329
330}
331
332final class CompositeTemplateFinder implements JStachioTemplateFinder {
333
334        private final Iterable<? extends JStachioTemplateFinder> finders;
335
336        private CompositeTemplateFinder(Iterable<? extends JStachioTemplateFinder> finders) {
337                super();
338                this.finders = finders;
339        }
340
341        public static JStachioTemplateFinder of(List<? extends JStachioTemplateFinder> finders) {
342                if (finders.size() == 1) {
343                        return finders.get(0);
344                }
345                ArrayList<JStachioTemplateFinder> sorted = new ArrayList<>();
346                sorted.addAll(finders);
347                sorted.sort(Comparator.comparingInt(JStachioTemplateFinder::order));
348                return new CompositeTemplateFinder(List.copyOf(sorted));
349        }
350
351        @Override
352        public TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
353                for (var f : finders) {
354                        var t = f.findOrNull(modelType);
355                        if (t != null) {
356                                return t;
357                        }
358                }
359                throw new TemplateNotFoundException(modelType);
360        }
361
362        @Override
363        public boolean supportsType(Class<?> modelType) {
364                for (var f : finders) {
365                        var b = f.supportsType(modelType);
366                        if (b)
367                                return true;
368                }
369                return false;
370        }
371
372}
